mapper.update: UPDATE article SET wid=#{wid}, catid=#{catid}, a_title=#{title}, a_intro=#{intro}, a_content=#{content}, a_recommand=#{recommand}, a_read_count=#{readCount}, a_like_count=#{likeCount}, a_dislike_count=#{dislikeCount}, a_publish_date=#{publishDate}, a_is_complete=#{isComplete}, a_is_writer_show=#{isWriterShow}, a_is_censored=#{isCensored} WHERE aid=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT article.aid AS id, article.a_title AS title, article.a_intro, article.a_content AS content, article.a_recommand AS recommand, article.a_read_count AS read_count, article.a_like_count AS like_count, article.a_dislike_count AS dislike_count, article.a_publish_date AS publish_date, article.a_is_complete AS is_complete, article.a_is_writer_show AS is_writer_show, article.a_is_censored AS is_censored, writer.wid AS wid, writer.w_pen_name AS writer_name, category.catid AS catid, category.cat_name AS category_name FROM article LEFT JOIN writer ON article.wid = writer.wid LEFT JOIN category ON article.catid = category.catid ORDER BY article.aid ASC

SELECT article.aid AS id, article.a_title AS title, article.a_intro, article.a_content AS content, article.a_recommand AS recommand, article.a_read_count AS read_count, article.a_like_count AS like_count, article.a_dislike_count AS dislike_count, article.a_publish_date AS publish_date, article.a_is_complete AS is_complete, article.a_is_writer_show AS is_writer_show, article.a_is_censored AS is_censored, writer.wid AS wid, writer.w_pen_name AS writer_name, category.catid AS catid, category.cat_name AS category_name FROM article LEFT JOIN writer ON article.wid = writer.wid LEFT JOIN category ON article.catid = category.catid WHERE article.aid=#{id}
SELECT category.catid AS id, category.cat_name AS name, COUNT( article.aid ) AS article_count FROM category LEFT JOIN article ON category.catid=article.catid GROUP BY category.catid
SELECT tag.tagid AS id, tag.tag_name AS name, COUNT( tag_map.aid ) AS article_count FROM tag LEFT JOIN tag_map ON tag.tagid=tag_map.tagid GROUP BY tag.tagid
SELECT tag_map.tagid AS id, tag.tag_name AS name FROM tag_map LEFT JOIN tag ON tag_map.tagid=tag.tagid WHERE tag_map.aid=#{id}
